channel.title: An Article Regular Expression
channel.description: Recent content on An Article Regular Expression

item.title: Regular Expression in Javascript
item.description: You may have encountered an error while filling out a form, which could be due to an incorrect email address or an invalid password. This error-checking mechanism uses a regular expression, or Regex in Javascript, to validate the input. With the help of a regular expression, we can examine a series of characters to determine whether they meet specific criteria. REGEX is short for regular expressions. Regular expressions can be found in many programming languages used today and are used to perform various functions.
